articles.title: Alex Antetokounmpo, younger brother of Giannis and Thanasis, traded to Milwaukee Bucks' G League affiliate
articles.description: The Wisconsin Herd, the G League affiliate of the Milwaukee Bucks, acquired Alex Antetokounmpo via trade on Monday, putting the youngest Antetokounmpo brother in the same organization as his elder siblings Giannis and Thanasis.

articles.title: Kyler Murray's new $230 million Arizona Cardinals contract mandates four hours of weekly film study
articles.description: Arizona Cardinals quarterback Kyler Murray's recently-signed contract extension includes an addendum that requires him to study film for four hours per week during the season in order to stay in compliance with his new deal.

articles.title: Kentucky Wildcats add another five-star pledge to 2023 college basketball recruiting class in Justin Edwards
articles.description: Small forward Justin Edwards announced his commitment to Kentucky on Monday, choosing the Wildcats over Tennessee and giving coach John Calipari his second five-star pledge in the 2023 class.
articles.content:

articles.title: Longtime receiver Danny Amendola retiring from NFL
articles.description: Despite multiple teams calling this offseason, two-time Super Bowl champion WR Danny Amendola has decided to retire from the NFL.
articles.content:
Longtime receiver Danny Amendola has decided to retire from the NFL despite receiving interest from multiple teams this offseason.

articles.title: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot pitches dome for Soldier Field to entice Bears to remain at stadium
articles.description: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot revealed three proposals on Monday for renovations to Soldier Field to entice the Bears to remain at their home stadium of the last 50 years.

articles.title: Green Bay Police Department confirms officer put his hands on Packers running back AJ Dillon during exhibition soccer match
